about_the_game:
Far away, at the foot of the snowy mountains, there is a village called Ereb. There is a rumor about this village, it says, "devouring everything, there is no return".

A sugar glider detective ignores the advice and goes to the Ereb Village alone. In addition, to finding the truth, she is looking forward to getting someone's clues.

Ask the villagers, get clues and get closer to the truth. But before that, why are all the villagers falling asleep?

Let's find a way to wake up the villagers first. The detective launches a search in Ereb Village.

Short branch, looks like it'll work. Little windmill, why are the blades loose？ Does the round sun blink its eyes just now?

As the villagers wake up, the truth about Ereb Village comes to light. At the same time, the detective's own memory is gradually awakened...










About Mouse

During the game, when you see the mouse cursor change from an "arrow" to a "paw", the area that is currently pointing at is interactive! You can click on this area to pick up items, talk to characters, or get information about the environment.

About Inventory

The inventory has a fantastic "combination" function. Enjoy combining item with environment, item with item, item with character.

About Magic Magnifying Glass

Inside the inventory, the magic magnifying glass is placed in the lower right corner of each item. Click on the magnifying glass to get more details about this item.

About Detail Page

When the mouse is hovering over the item, more information about this item will be displayed. Some items contain interesting puzzles, so make sure you interact with them on the detail page.

reviews:
“This game is fantastic, I highly recommend others to play it. The art is beautiful as well as the music, and the characters are adorable. The gameplay is also fun and challenging, the inspection ability and being able to interact with the items I have is very clever. My favorite parts are the owl explaining things to you and the dialogue, especially when talking to the duck.”
